page.title: 07CHARLES CHURCH.
page.content: The rapid growth of Camberley,during the last twenty years has been aided by the expansion of several small companies of builders.Probably the most well known company in this area is Charles Church.Charles Church is a local company founded in 1966,when a Mr C.J.G.Church buIlt his first house, here in Camberley.Since then it has transformed into a multi-million pound international business concept,with building developments in parts of Southern England and Ireland.They are generally rather "up-market"homes,well designed and pleasantly landscaped. Most C.C. develpments in this area have been "in-fill" development.An old Victorian house being pulled down making room for several new homes.A recent development is a large estate near Lightwater.
